metadata.synopsis: One of the worgs in the worg pens, driven mad with excitement by the presence of Halsin, a druid transformed into a bear.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. teleport S_GOB_WolfPens_Beastmaster_0024. walk down stairs to cage with Worgs5. click on worg 'Tale' behind cage

0.speaker: Tale
0.text: Fur. Can't you smell the fur? Fur and meat. Lots of MEAT!

1.speaker: Tale
1.text: Meat, Meat. Let me TEAR it up!

2.speaker: Tale
2.text: Out. OUT. Out and RIP it apart.
2.context: NodeContext: Wants to eat the bear
